SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &mail# = "" !:PRINT "looking for AE e-mail from user: &$ACTIVATOR#" :SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(DEMO.AE_USER_MAIL_MAPPING2) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &mail# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) !: PRINT "found: &mail#" :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:SET &userdep# ="&$USER#/AUTOMIC" !:PRINT "finally use: &userdep#" :SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&userdep#,"/") :SET &pos# = SUB(&pos#, 1) :PSET &TRIGGEREDBYUSER# = MID(&userdep#,1,&pos#) :SET &pos# = ADD(&pos#, 2) :PSET &TRIGGEREDBYDEPARTMENT# = MID(&userdep#,&pos#) :PSET &TRIGGEREDBYMAIL# = &mail# :Pset &nl# = UC_CRLF

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
https://twitter.com/AutomicDemo/
NOTE: SAP System Currently Down (Ticket with It) Hadoop Also Currently not Avaiable!

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &UC4_CLIENT# = SYS_ACT_CLIENT :SET &UC4_SNAME# = GET_UC_SYSTEM_NAME

XHEADER.Title: Service-Now | Upload Reports and Close Change for Protocol

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_EMAIL.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN @echo off :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "*" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/email-tool.jar" mail Send -s &UC4RB_EMAIL_SSERVERPORT# -u &UC4RB_EMAIL_SFROM# -pwd &UC4RB_EMAIL_SFROMPASSWORD# -to &UC4RB_EMAIL_STO# * -sbj "&UC4RB_EMAIL_SSUBJECT#" * -b "&UC4RB_EMAIL_SBODY#" * -at "&UC4RB_EMAIL_SATTACHMENT#" * -prc &UC4RB_EMAIL_SSMTPDETAILS# * -ll "INFO" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:WAIT 10
BW_ACTIVATE_CHAIN ID="Z_TEST1",REPLICATE="YES"

:SET &LOGLN# = SYS_USER_LNAME() :SET &SNOW_ASSIGNED_TO#= &LOGLN# :SET &SNOW_APPROVAL# = 'not requested'. :SET &SNOW_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#='Software' :SET &SNOW_BUSINESS_SERVICE#='Basic Infrastructure' :SET &SNOW_SHORT_DESCRIPTION#='Scanning Operating Systems, As/400 Message Queues, and Databases' :SET &SNOW_CATEGORY#='other' :SET &SNOW_CHANGE_PRIORITY#='4 - Low' :SET &SNOW_IMPACT#='3 - Low' :SET &SNOW_INITIAL_STATE#='Open' :SET &SNOW_REQUESTOR#=&LOGLN# :SET &SNOW_RISK#='Moderate' :SET &SNOW_DESCRIPTION#='Automic RunID: &$RUNID# Scanning Operating Systems, As/400 Message Queues, and Databases Service started';' :SET &SNOW_TYPE#='Routine' :SET &SNOW_PLANNED_END_DATE# = "" :SET &SNOW_PLANNED_START_DATE# = ""

:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 2 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = str_split(&$USER#,"/") : SEND_MSG &$USER#,&$DEPARTMENT#,"!*********Started Shrink of Database Activated***************!" !:PSET &RUNID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(AWA.MSSQL_SHRINK_DB.001#JOBP) !:SET &call# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(AWA.NOT_SHRINK.001#CALL,,,,,PASS_VALUES)
:WAIT 10
R3_ACTIVATE_REPORT REPORT="RSUSR000",DESTINATION="LP01" R3_GET_JOB_SPOOL FILE="(REPORT,REP)"

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 5 :PSET &AK# = &$ARCHIVE_KEY2# :FILL &ARRAY#[] = GET_VAR(VARA.GENERAL_MAPPING, "&AK#") :SET &AGENT# = &ARRAY#[1] :SET &LOGIN# = &ARRAY#[2] :SET &QUEUE# = &ARRAY#[3] :PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :PUT_ATT QUEUE = &QUEUE#

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:PRINT "ServiceNow Change SysID : &SYS_ID#" :PRINT "ServiceNow Change Number: &CHANGE_NUMBER#" ! :PSET &CHANGE_SYS_ID# = &SYS_ID# :pub &CHANGE_NUMBER#,,TOP
:ADD_COMMENT &$ACTIVATOR_RUNID# , "Change Ticket was created, link to ticket: https://ven01747.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=change_request.do?sys_id=&SYS_ID#"

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Sends an e-mail with or without attachments.

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!get the agent OS type :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("AGENT#")
:IF &AGENT# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting agent to &AGENT#" :ELSE : SET &AGENT# = GET_ATT(HOST) : PRINT "JOB: agent is preconfigured to &AGENT#" :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :PRINT "WIN_TYP: &UC_WIN_TYP"
:SET &JOB_TYPE# = "INVALID - JOB Object Type" :IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "BAT" OR "KDO" OR "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" :ELSE : SET &UC_UNIX_TYPE = GET_ATT("UNIX_TYPE") : PRINT "UNIX_TYPE: &UC_UNIX_TYPE" : IF &UC_UNIX_TYPE = "SHELL_SCRIPT" OR "COMMAND" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &JOB_TYPE# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&JOB_TYPE#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &JOB_TYPE# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) :PRINT "HEADER: agent bin directory &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#"
:SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("LOGIN#")
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting login to &LOGIN#" :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) : PRINT "JOB: login is preconfigured to &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN#

XHEADER.Title: Transfer CSV files from A to B

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
Transfers one or more files from one host to another host using the agent-to-agent file transfer mechanism.
Both the host can be any Unix or Windows machines. All empty folders (no files inside) will be transfered.
Following settings cannot be changed during runtime: * keep original file attributes (yes/no) * abort at first error (yes/no)

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :WAIT 10

:SET &LOGLN# = SYS_USER_LNAME() :SET &SNOW_ASSIGNED_TO#= &LOGLN# :SET &SNOW_APPROVAL# = 'not requested'. :SET &SNOW_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#='Software' :SET &SNOW_BUSINESS_SERVICE#='Basic Infrastructure' :SET &SNOW_SHORT_DESCRIPTION#='Scanning Operating Systems, As/400 Message Queues, and Databases' :SET &SNOW_CATEGORY#='other' :SET &SNOW_CHANGE_PRIORITY#='4 - Low' :SET &SNOW_IMPACT#='3 - Low' :SET &SNOW_INITIAL_STATE#='Open' :SET &SNOW_REQUESTOR#=&LOGLN# :SET &SNOW_RISK#='Moderate' :SET &SNOW_DESCRIPTION#='Automic RunID: &$RUNID# Scanning Operating Systems, As/400 Message Queues, and Databases Service started';' :SET &SNOW_TYPE#='Routine' :SET &SNOW_PLANNED_END_DATE# = "" :SET &SNOW_PLANNED_START_DATE# = ""

:INC JOBI.UC4.UNIQUE.VALUES :DELETE_VAR VARA.D70.001#USER_LIST :SET &HND = PREP_PROCESS_FILE('VVIECORE10','D:\AutomicBleedingEdge\Agents\sapd70\TEMP\&UC4_SNAME#_&UC4_CLIENT#_RSUSR200_UC4.txt','*|A Dialog |*','COL=DELIMITER','DELIMITER=*|*','UC_LOGIN=LOGIN.ADMINISTRATOR') :PROCESS &HND : SET &SAP_USER = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND,2) : SET &SAP_LOGONDATE = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND,9) : SET &SAP_USER = STR_LTRIM(&SAP_USER) : SET &SAP_USER = STR_RTRIM(&SAP_USER) : SET &SAP_LOGONDATE = STR_LTRIM(&SAP_LOGONDATE) : SET &SAP_LOGONDATE = STR_RTRIM(&SAP_LOGONDATE) : IF &SAP_LOGONDATE = 'Not in Use' or 'unbenutzt' : PUT_VAR VARA.D70.001#USER_LIST, '&SAP_USER','********' : PRINT &SAP_USER, &SAP_LOGONDATE : ELSE : SET &SAP_LOGONDATE = CONV_DATE('DD.MM.YYYY:&SAP_LOGONDATE','YYYYMMDD') : PUT_VAR VARA.D70.001#USER_LIST, '&SAP_USER','&SAP_LOGONDATE' : PRINT &SAP_USER, &SAP_LOGONDATE : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :INC JOBI.UC4.UNIQUE.VALUES :SET &FILE_NAME# = '&UC4_SNAME#_&UC4_CLIENT#_RSUSR200_UC4.txt' :SET &WIN_PATH# = 'D:\AutomicBleedingEdge\Agents\sapd70\TEMP\' :SET &UX_PATH# = '/opt/automic/agents/unix/out/' :PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = '&WIN_PATH#&FILE_NAME#' :PUT_ATT FT_DST_FILE = '&UX_PATH#&FILE_NAME#'
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_EMAIL.PRV.STORE", "EMAILTOOL.jar", C, N

select top 50 ccnumber, city, username, emailaddress, middleinitial, surname, streetaddress, city, state, statefull, zipcode, country, countryfull, emailaddress, cctype, cvv2, ccexpires, nationalid, upstracking, westernunionmtcn, telephonenumber from dbo.fakenames;

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", "DELIMITER=*|*") :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,"C:\temp\export_&$RUNID#_&$USER#.CSV",AESRv1, LOGIN.ALL.AGENTS,OVERWRITE) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE1# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &LINE2# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : SET &LINE3# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,3) : SET &LINE4# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,4) :P "****************************************************************************************************" :P "&LINE1# | &LINE2# | &LINE3# | &LINE4#" :ENDPROCESS !:if &$RESTART_COUNT# < 30 !: SET &START# = RESTART_UC_ObJECT(&$NAME#, &$RUNID#) !:endif

XHEADER.Title: WIN Interpreter Powershell Disk Size Example

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :begin_ext_int POWERSHELL $size = ([wmi]"\\localhost\root\cimv2:Win32_logicalDisk.DeviceID='c:'").Size $free = "Hello World from Powershell" $free Start-Sleep -s 20 :end_ext_int POWERSHELL

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: : set &SIZE# = DIV(&SIZE#, '1073741824') : set &FREE# = DIV(&FREE#, '1073741824') : set &used# = DIV(&used#, '1073741824') : set &SIZE# = FORMAT(&SIZE#) : set &FREE# = FORMAT(&FREE#) : set &used# = FORMAT(&used#) :PUBLISH &FREE#,,"WORKFLOW" :print ******************************************* :print **************POWERSHELL VARIABLE********* :print ******************************************* :print POWERSHELL VARIABLE VALUE SIZE = "&SIZE#" :print POWERSHELL VARIABLE VALUE FREE = "&FREE#" :print POWERSHELL VARIABLE VALUE USED = "&used#" :print *******************************************

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_HOST = "&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_HOST#"
:SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TRANSFER_KEEPS# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_DFFT_TRANSFER_KEEPS#) :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TRANSFER_COMP# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_DFFT_TRANSFER_COMP#) :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_WILDCARD# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_DFFT_WILDCARD#) :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_SUBDIR# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_SUBDIR#) :SET &UC4RB_COMPLETE_FOLDER_STRUCT# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_COMPLETE_FOLDER_STRUCT#) :SET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_ACTIONIF# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_ACTIONIF#)
:SET &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_HOST#) :SET &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_HOST#)
! TARGET_ACTIONIF can only be one of APPEN,OVERWRITE, CANCEL when comming from the promptset ! a YES or NO can only be passed in via the DD :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_ACTIONIF# = "YES" OR "NO" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_AGENT_2_AGENT.PRV.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATHS_AND_UPDATE_WILDCARD_MODE :ENDIF
! Handle Source-Path :PRINT "Source-Path before convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#" ! WINDOWS :IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE : PSET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF
!UNIX :IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : PSET &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF :PRINT "Source-Path after convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#"
! Handle Target-Path :PRINT "Target before convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#" ! WINDOWS :IF &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE : PSET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF
! UNIX :IF &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : PSET &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ENDIF :PRINT "Target after convert: &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#"
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = "&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_FILES#" :PUT_ATT FT_DST_FILE = "&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_FILES#" :PUT_ATT FT_DST_HOST = "&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_HOST#"
:PUT_ATT FT_COMPRESS = "NO" :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_TRANSFER_COMP# = "YES" : PUT_ATT FT_COMPRESS = "NORMAL" :ENDIF :PUT_ATT FT_ERASE_SRC_FILE = "Y" :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_TRANSFER_KEEPS# = "YES" : PUT_ATT FT_ERASE_SRC_FILE = "N" :ENDIF :PUT_ATT FT_EXISTING_DST_FILE = "A" :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_ACTIONIF# = "OVERWRITE" OR "YES" : PUT_ATT FT_EXISTING_DST_FILE = "O" :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_ACTIONIF# = "APPEND" : PUT_ATT FT_EXISTING_DST_FILE = "E" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT FT_FILE_TYPE = "T" :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_TRANSFER_FORMAT# = "BINARY" : PUT_ATT FT_FILE_TYPE = "B" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT FT_WILDCARDS = "N" :IF &UC4RB_DFFT_WILDCARD# = "YES" : PUT_ATT FT_WILDCARDS = "Y" : PUT_ATT MAX_PARALLEL_TRANSFERS = "1" : IF &UC4RB_DFFT_PARALLEL_TRANSFER# > 1 : PUT_ATT MAX_PARALLEL_TRANSFERS = "&UC4RB_DFFT_PARALLEL_TRANSFER#" : ENDIF : PUT_ATT FT_INCLUDE_SUB_DIR = "N" : IF &UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_SUBDIR# = "YES" : PUT_ATT FT_INCLUDE_SUB_DIR = "Y" : PUT_ATT FT_TRANSFER_FOLDERS = "N" : IF &UC4RB_COMPLETE_FOLDER_STRUCT# = "YES" : PUT_ATT FT_TRANSFER_FOLDERS = "Y" : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_LOGIN = "&UC4RB_DFFT_SOURCE_LOGIN#" :PUT_ATT FT_DST_LOGIN = "&UC4RB_DFFT_TARGET_LOGIN#"

SCRIPT.MSCRI: ps -ef | grep uc ls -l /opt/automic/agents/unix/out

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :s &LB# = UC_CRLF() :IF &RUNID1# <> "" :S &COUNT# = 1 : s &HND1# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(&RUNID1#, "rep") !: s &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(&RUNID2#, "rep") !: s &HND3# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(&RUNID3#, "rep") !: s &HND4# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(&RUNID4#, "rep") : PROCESS &HND1# : s &ADDL# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND1#) : if &COUNT# = 1 : S &REP# = &ADDL# : ELSE : S &REP# = "&REP# &LB# &aDDL#" : endif : s &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : ENDPROCESS !: PROCESS &HND2# !: s &ADDL# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#) !: S &REP# = "&REP# &LB# &aDDL#" !: s &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 !: ENDPROCESS !: PROCESS &HND3# !: s &ADDL# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND3#) !: S &REP# = "&REP# &LB# &aDDL#" !: s &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 !: ENDPROCESS !: PROCESS &HND4# !: s &ADDL# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND4#) !: S &REP# = "&REP# &LB# &aDDL#" !: s &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 !: ENDPROCESS : PSET &REP# = &REP# : ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &LOGLN# = SYS_USER_LNAME() :SET &SNOW_ASSIGNED_TO#= &LOGLN# :SET &SNOW_APPROVAL# = 'not requested'. :SET &SNOW_ASSIGNMENT_GROUP#='Software' :SET &SNOW_BUSINESS_SERVICE#='Basic Infrastructure' :SET &SNOW_SHORT_DESCRIPTION#='Scanning Operating Systems, As/400 Message Queues, and Databases' :SET &SNOW_CATEGORY#='other' :SET &SNOW_CHANGE_PRIORITY#='4 - Low' :SET &SNOW_IMPACT#='3 - Low' :SET &SNOW_INITIAL_STATE#='Open' :SET &SNOW_REQUESTOR#=&LOGLN# :SET &SNOW_RISK#='Moderate' :SET &SNOW_DESCRIPTION#='Automic RunID: &$RUNID# Scanning Operating Systems, As/400 Message Queues, and Databases Service started';' :SET &SNOW_TYPE#='Routine' :SET &SNOW_PLANNED_END_DATE# = "" :SET &SNOW_PLANNED_START_DATE# = ""
